tweet.text: On July 31, 1991, Pres. Bush and Gorbachev signed the #START treaty in Moscow—just weeks before an attempted coup in Moscow and a few months before the collapse of the Soviet Union. 📷 @Bush41Library (ID: P24017-08) https://t.co/d430hoOBgQ
tweet.html: On July 31, 1991, Pres. Bush and Gorbachev signed the #START treaty in Moscow—just weeks before an attempted coup in Moscow and a few months before the collapse of the Soviet Union. 📷 @Bush41Library (ID: P24017-08)
